data.fullContent: The annual theatre festival will take place on June 23rd. Shows will run from 8:00 am to 8:00 pm, with a break for lunch at 1:00 pm. Attendees are encouraged to buy their tickets early, as we expect to sell out. All shows are family friendly, so feel free to bring your children.
data.answer: 一年一度的戏剧节将于6月23日举行。演出将从上午8点持续到晚上8点，下午1点休息吃午饭。我们鼓励参会者提前购票，因为我们预计门票会售罄。所有节目都是家庭友好的，所以请带着你的孩子一起来。
